definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The other major trend of the past few years has been the move to multi-core chips.
sentences.chinese: 过去几年的另一个主要趋势是向多核芯片的过渡。

sentences.english: But in future chips, cores’ bandwidth requirements could fluctuate wildly.
sentences.chinese: 但在未来芯片中，核心的带宽需求会剧烈波动。

sentences.english: Many of the channel impairments described above can be mitigated on-chip using equalization.
sentences.chinese: 上面提到的信道损害可以在芯片上用均等化来减轻。

sentences.english: But, Hu said his company's chips do not contain the maps, which were put at the government's printing facilities.
sentences.chinese: 但胡称，公司的芯片未包含这张政府用于印刷的地图。

sentences.english: This cuts the TDP of the chip to 65W.
sentences.chinese: 这降低芯片的功耗为65瓦。

sentences.english: One-chip telephone IC with speech, dialler and ringer functions.
sentences.chinese: 单芯片的讲话，拨号和振铃功能的电话IC。

sentences.english: However, China's chip-making capabilities are improving quickly.
sentences.chinese: 然而，中国的芯片制造能力正在快速发展。

sentences.english: A novel laser confocal biochip scanner was given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种新颖的激光共焦生物芯片扫描仪。

sentences.english: The communication mechanism inter-processor in SOC was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种在SOC芯片中多处理器之间通信的机制。

sentences.english: The question is how they can get chips that easily.
sentences.chinese: 问题是，他们如何能轻而易举的获得芯片。

sentences.english: The results of simulation and DC test for DVD OPIC are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中给出模拟结果及芯片直流测试结果。

sentences.english: Figure 7 shows the sequence for tape bonding the chip and assembling the package.
sentences.chinese: 图7所示为带状引线连接芯片和管壳装配的工艺程序。

sentences.english: IR2172 is a current sensing IC presented by International Rectifier Company.
sentences.chinese: IR2172是国际整流器公司推出的电流传感芯片。

sentences.english: While the price for microchip implantation Can vary, it often falls between $25 and $40.
sentences.chinese: 微芯片植入的价格不等，常在25和40美元之间。

sentences.english: It is not an unreasonable question. The answer, I suspect, will not be a better microchip, although we still do need those.
sentences.chinese: 这是个必然的问题，但我想答案不再会是芯片。

definition: slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
